auth.description: Get the auth link to connect your Discord account to your Trello account.

donate.description: Get the donation links for the developer.

github.description: Sends the bot's open source link.

serverinvite.description: Get the invite for the support server.

asynceval.note:
Due to the added async IIFE wrapper in this command, it is necessary to use the return statement to return a result.
e.g. `{{&cleanPrefix}}aeval return 1`

help.description: Shows the help message and gives information on commands.

locale.description: Shows a list of all locales.

shardinfo.description: Gives the stats for every shard.

me.description: View information about your Trello account.

switch.description: Selects a board to use for other commands. Use the `{{&cleanPrefix}}boards` command to see what boards you can select.

boards.description: Lists all of the boards you can manage.

error: An error occurred while processing that command!
